mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transactions (id, user_id, amount, category_id, type, description, date, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{id}, #{userId}, #{amount}, #{categoryId}, #{type}, #{description}, #{date}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE transactions SET amount = #{amount}, category_id = (select category_id from article_categories where name = #{categoryName}), type = #{type}, description = #{description}, date = #{date}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.amount, t.type, t.description, t.date, c.name as category FROM transactions t LEFT JOIN transaction_categories c ON t.category_id = c.id WHERE t.id = #{id}
